dictionary

Interface DictionaryProc

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Dictionary

    public interface DictionaryProc

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(java.lang.String word, java.lang.String synonym)
      Adds a new word to the dictionary.
      boolean contains(java.lang.String word)
      Verifies if the dictionary contains a specific word
      void populate()
      Loads the content of the dictionary from a specific file.
      void remove(java.lang.String word)
      Removes word from dictionary
      void save()
      Saves the dictionary to a file.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> search(java.lang.String word)
      Searches for a word in the dictionary.

    • Method Detail

      • populate

        void populate()
        Loads the content of the dictionary from a specific file. When loading the content, old content will be erased, so this may actually lead to a decrease in size in some conditions.

      • add

        void add(java.lang.String word,
       java.lang.String synonym)
        Adds a new word to the dictionary. It may also be used to add a new synonym to a word. A word can not have itself as a synonym
        Parameters:
        word - word to add to the dictionary
        synonym - synonym of the added word

      • remove

        void remove(java.lang.String word)
        Removes word from dictionary
        Parameters:
        word - word to remove

      • save

        void save()
        Saves the dictionary to a file.

      • search

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> search(java.lang.String word)
        Searches for a word in the dictionary. The characters '*' and '?' play the role of wildcards and can be used to search for words with a specified pattern '?' replaces a single character '*' replaces a variable number of characters
        Parameters:
        word - word to search for
        Returns:
        String ArrayList which contains all the matching words

      • contains

        boolean contains(java.lang.String word)
        Verifies if the dictionary contains a specific word
        Parameters:
        word - word to be contained by the dictionary
        Returns:
        true if word is contained, false if not
